SorcererLevel7Spells.Name: Delayed Blast Fireball
SorcererLevel7Spells.Description: A beam of brilliant light flashes out from your hand in a 5-foot-wide, 60-foot-line.

SorcererLevel7Spells.Name: Etherealness
SorcererLevel7Spells.Description: This spell gives the willing creature you touch the ability to see things as they actually are.

SorcererLevel7Spells.Name: Finger of Death
SorcererLevel7Spells.Description: You send negative energy coursing through a creature that you can see within range, causing it searing pain.

SorcererLevel7Spells.Name: Fire Storm
SorcererLevel7Spells.Description: A storm made up of sheets of roaring flame appears in a location you choose within range.

SorcererLevel7Spells.Name: Plane Shift
SorcererLevel7Spells.Description: You and up to eight willing creatures who link hands in a circle are transported to a different plane of existence.

SorcererLevel7Spells.Name: Prismatic Spray
SorcererLevel7Spells.Description: Eight multicolored rays of light flash from your hand.

SorcererLevel7Spells.Name: Reverse Gravity
SorcererLevel7Spells.Description: This spell reverses gravity in a 50-foot-radius, 100-foot high cylinder centered on a point within range.

SorcererLevel7Spells.Name: Teleport
SorcererLevel7Spells.Description: This spell instantly transports you and up to eight willing creatures of your choice that you can see within range.
